title: Board game recommendations for "Something strategic that won't melt my brain..."
prompt: Something strategic that won't melt my brain

recommendations.title: Ticket to Ride
recommendations.sommelierPitch: All aboard the strategy express — no brain frying required!
whyItFits: This classic train game combines strategic route planning and light competition without overwhelming your cognitive circuits.

recommendations.title: Carcassonne
recommendations.sommelierPitch: Put your tile-laying skills to the test, but keep your brain nice and cozy!
whyItFits: Easy to learn yet offers strategic depth through placement and area control, perfect for a relaxed yet tactical experience.

recommendations.title: Kingdomino
recommendations.sommelierPitch: Dominoes just got a royal upgrade — strategy fit for a king without the headache!
whyItFits: This quick game encourages strategic thinking through tile placement while keeping the complexity manageable and fun.

recommendations.title: Azul
recommendations.sommelierPitch: Splat some color on your brain without splattering it all over the wall!
whyItFits: A beautifully designed game that offers strategic depth with simple mechanics, allowing you to plan without overthinking.

recommendations.title: Splendor
recommendations.sommelierPitch: Collect gems and build an empire without needing a PhD in strategy!
whyItFits: With straightforward rules and a focus on resource management, this game offers strategic choices without the mental overload.

recommendations.title: 7 Wonders
recommendations.sommelierPitch: Build your ancient civilization without the risk of ancient brain freeze!
whyItFits: A card drafting game that balances strategy with a light touch, allowing you to strategize across multiple rounds without stress.

recommendations.title: Sushi Go!
recommendations.sommelierPitch: Grab a bite of strategy without a side of confusion!
whyItFits: A fast-paced card drafting game that's easy to learn and offers a delightful mix of strategy and fun, perfect for light gaming sessions.

recommendations.title: Catan
recommendations.sommelierPitch: Trade your way to victory without the risk of strategy-induced migraines!
whyItFits: This classic game offers strategic depth through trading and resource management, but remains accessible and enjoyable for all.

recommendations.title: Patchwork
recommendations.sommelierPitch: Sew together a quilt of strategy without losing your mind over it!
whyItFits: A delightful two-player game that requires strategic thinking while being simple enough to play without brain overload.
